Class SecondRoundState

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.states.SecondRoundState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IState

    public class SecondRoundState
extends java.lang.Object
implements IState
    A state where the active player is in the second round. Implements the methods from IState
